antivirus.wrappers.freshclam module¶

Wrapper over freshclam program to update database over amqp.

antivirus.wrappers.freshclam.require_root(fn)[source]¶

Decorator to make sure, that user is root.

antivirus.wrappers.freshclam.update_database(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Run freshclam. Make sure, that user is root.
